details.description:
Incredible 3 bedroom - right by the park!
- 3 bedrooms - 1 bath - hardwood floors - heat and hot water included
Around the corner from Prospect Park! Pasta Louise, Nighthawk Cinema, Dog Day Afternoon, Fonda, WINNER Cafe, Greenwood Park Bar, etc all nearby. Close to F and G trains for easy transportation.
No broker fee Available now SMALL pets OK

Nice 3 bed just 1 block from PROSPECT PARK!!
- Hardwood Floors Throughout - 3 Great Sized Bedrooms - Separate Living Room - Small Pets Welcome - Heat/Hot Water Included
You will not beat this apartment. The B/Q train is literally around the corner and so it PROSPECT PARK!! The neighborhood is so great with bars, grocery, and restaurants everywhere. These apartment don?t last long so take a look today.
Small pets OK Available now

No need to choose between Bushwick and BedStuy with this one! Live right on that line and enjoy one of the quickest growing and most popular neighborhoods today. With all the conveniences of and Broadway right outside and Myrtle Avenue just down the street, you'll have everything you need nearby. Quickly walk to a HUGE grocer (such a luxury in Brooklyn), bars and restaurants galore, and the easiest transportation ever! Conveniently located off the J and M trains as well as the B15, B38, B46, B47, and B54 bus routes. FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Excellent Natural Light! Shared Laundry Room Shared Roof Deck Bike Storage Parking (by availability) Pet Friendly for only $50/month!!

amenities.other: Hardwood Floors, Roof Access, Shared Outdoor Space

details.description:
4 bedroom / 1 bath in a fantastic location on Troutman St! Huge apartment covers the entire first floor. There is a common backyard just outside the apartment, but there are only 5 apartments in the building. Laundry in the building This is a true 4br with large living room!
See video!
No Fee! Just 1st and security Pets ok Call or text to view right away

details.description: Do not miss out on this 3BR/1baths apartment in Brooklyn's up and coming neighborhood Prospect Lefferts Gardens! People forget that Brooklyn is the biggest borough and offers some of the best, historic architecture. Enjoy the neighborhoods easy access to the B,Q,2,3 lines, a number of bus lines, and short walk to Prospect Park. Live within steps to juice bars, grocery stores, restaurants, coffee shops, bars, pharmacies, banks, local bakeries, and more to explore. Brooklyn Greenery, MIdwood Flats, Irv's, Bluebird, Blessings, and Food Sermon are just a couple of the many options to check out in this vibrant neighborhood.Easy commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Private Outdoor Space, Shared Outdoor Space

details.description:
77 Commercial is a new landmark on the north edge of the Greenpoint, Brooklyn waterfront, situated between two great outdoor spaces ? a beautiful, lushly landscaped inner court to the east, and the long anticipated Box Street Park to the west.
Discover a range of living spaces tailored to your needs, including studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom layouts.
Apartment Features: -Expansive living areas boasting breathtaking views -Fully equipped kitchens with stainless steel appliances -Dishwasher -In-unit washer/dryer for added convenience -Individual AC/Heat units -Big windows inviting abundant natural light -Soaring high ceilings and elegant hardwood floors
Building Amenities: -State-of-the-art fitness center -Relaxing sauna -Basketball and tennis courts -Inviting indoor pool with direct access to outdoor pool deck -Multiple BBQ grilling areas -Rooftop retreat offering panoramic views -Residents lounge and versatile working space -Entertainment-filled recreation room -Secure bicycle storage -Convenient elevators -Parking garage available (additional fee applies)
Location: Enjoy seamless access to the new esplanade and ferry terminal, ensuring swift commutes to Manhattan.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Stainless steel appliances, Central A/C

Newly renovated, with 3 similar sized bedrooms and a large living area. Exposed brick, stainless steel appliances, and hardwood floors. Very high ceilings!

Large and renovated 3 Bedroom apartment just 3 blocks from the beautiful Brooklyn Botanical Gardens and Prospect Park.
This apartment is located around the corner from the 2/3/4/5 Subway lines and is just a short walk to the B/Q lines for quick access around the city. It is also near many trendy Bars, Cafes and restaurants.
This apartment includes:
- Bedrooms with lots of Windows for great Sunlight - Modern Kitchen with Stainless steel appliances including Dishwasher and Microwave - Large Living/Dining room - Large tiled Bathroom with Large soaking tub, Vanity and Mirror - Tons of closet space throughout - Heat and Hot water included - Laundry next door to building with option to drop off
One Month Fee due at signing. Good credit and income required Guarantors welcome!
Feel free to contact us with any questions or to schedule a showing!

Beautiful 4 bedroom on Franklin Ave. Living room with windows. 4 bedrooms with closet. Renovated kitchen. Oak wood floors. Fully tiled bathroom with large soaking tub. Close to the S,2,3,4, and 5 train.Right near Prospect Park, Brooklyn Museum and Franklin Ave's trendy restaurants and bars. Contact us today for your showing!
No broker fee Available 8/1 Cats only

Beautiful 3 beds with exposed brick, ample closet space and great light. Apartment features exposed brick, beautifully tiled bathrooms, dishwasher, microwave, Central A/C, hardwood floors, views on Manhattan from the windows. Location is prime Bushwick, steps to the Central Ave (M), and just a few blocks from the L at Morgan or Jefferson, and not far from Myrtle Wyckoff JMZ.

Stunning 3-bedroom unit in prime Bushwick location, steps from L/M trains. Queen-sized bedrooms, spacious living room with dining area. Modern amenities: central air, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher. High ceilings, hardwood floors, ample closet space. Pet-friendly, video intercom, laundry. Quick 22-min commute to Union Square. Nearby bars, restaurants, supermarket, and park. Guarantors accepted. Virtual/live tours available. Don't miss out!

Prime Crown Heights Living at 1499 Bedford Ave!
Discover the epitome of modern living at 1499 Bedford Ave, a new building in the heart of Crown Heights. Located steps from Eastern Parkway and multiple subway lines, and within walking distance of Grand Army Plaza, Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, and Prospect Park, this residence offers unparalleled convenience and vibrant city life.
Building Amenities:
State-of-the-art fitness room Pet wash station Laundry facilities (in-unit laundry in some units) Social lounge with game room Furnished rooftop with panoramic city views Second-floor public terrace Open workstations Dedicated mail room
Unit Features: Private terraces and balconies in select units Kitchen islands in select units Large windows with abundant natural light Stunning views of NYC skyline, Prospect Park, and neighborhood streets
Welcome to 1499 Bedford Ave?where luxury, community, and convenience meet. Experience the best of Crown Heights living.

BRAND NEW LUXURY BUILDING in the beautiful Vinegar Hill area of DUMBO!! Enjoy unbelievable views across both the Manhattan Bridge and Brooklyn Bridge. Visit the countless parks nearby such as John St Park, Main St Park, Trinity Park, Brooklyn Bridge Park, Cadman Plaza Park, Whitman Park and even more! Become a patron of some of the long standing and delicious LOCAL local restaurants such as Bridge Coffee and still enjoy those late night cravings spots we pretend we don't know and love (*cough Shake Shack) just a few blocks further. Take a little old school Brooklyn, mix in some new luxury living, and that's how you'll end up falling in love with your new home here!Conveniently located off the A, C and F trains as well as the B57, B62, B69 bus routes.UNIT FEATURES:Hardwood FloorsStainless Steel KitchenDishwasher; MicrowaveCentral A/C; HeatInquire for Private Balconies!Inquire for IN UNIT laundry!BUILDING FEATURES:Roof DeckLaundry RoomFitness CenterRec RoomTenant LoungePackage RoomBike StoragePets AllowedFirst; SecurityNO BROKER FEE!

details.description:
3br/1bth! Quiet convenience is the name of the game! Just a couple blocks off Myrtle-Wyckoff means restaurants, bars, coffee, FULL SIZE grocers (a borderline luxury in NYC), bodegas galore, and so much intersecting transportation! The list goes on as to why this neighborhood is one of the best in North Brooklyn. The greatest part of it all is that somehow, even with all that happening just around the corner, you can find a quiet calmness on these side streets. You'll really have it all!
Conveniently located off the L and M trains, as well as the B13, B26, B52, B54, B60, Q55, and Q58 bus lines.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen
Central A/C and heat
BUILDING FEATURES: Laundry Room
First; Security NO FEE

This Ridgewood neighborhood backs right up to Bushwick, serving as it's older and wiser sibling. You can enjoy all of the same delicious cuisine, fair trade hot (and necessary) coffee, unique locally owned businesses, bodegas and grocers, and centralized transportation as it's neighboring Brooklyn areas.
Experience that side of life while also keeping that lovely community feel of the slightly more residential and peaceful Queens existence. You can have it both ways! Now top that all off with the fact this quiet building only has 6 units!! *long exhale* now that's the right choice. Conveniently located off the M and L trains, as well as the B13, B20, B38, and Q39, and Q58 bus lines.
Pet Friendly No Fee First and security to move in!

amenities.other: Central A/C, Hardwood Floors, Washer/Dryer In Unit

details.description:
Welcome to 2 Stanwix 2R/2A in Brooklyn, NY! This stunning 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment offers a spacious and bright living space, perfect for comfortable urban living. Conveniently located just two blocks away from the Myrtle Av Station (J + M + Z) and within half a mile of the Morgan Av Station (L), this newly renovated unit is situated at the border of Bushwick and Williamsburg, offering the best of both vibrant neighborhoods. With its prime location, you can reach Manhattan in just 20 minutes.
Inside the apartment, you'll find modern amenities that enhance your lifestyle. The kitchen features a dishwasher, making meal preparation and cleanup a breeze. Whether you're a foodie or enjoy hosting dinner parties, this convenient appliance adds a touch of convenience to your daily routine.
Furthermore, pet owners will be delighted to know that pets are allowed in the building, making it a welcoming and inclusive community for furry friends. The building itself offers additional amenities to enhance your living experience. Laundry facilities are conveniently located within the building, ensuring you can easily take care of your laundry needs without leaving the premises. Additionally, a virtual doorman service provides an added layer of security and convenience, allowing you to feel safe and secure in your new home.
With its spacious layout, desirable location, and modern amenities, 2 Stanwix 2R/2A is the perfect place to call home for those seeking a comfortable and convenient living experience in Brooklyn, NY.

You?ll enjoy a generously-spaced 3-bed option, in the beautiful neighborhood of Astoria, yeah, green space and good bites, for days!
You?ll enjoy a super sun-lit 3 bedroom unit that can each room comfortably fit a queen-sized bed, dresser, tall wardrobe, make it your studio or even home gym or playroom for a little-one.
Make dinner without, having to clear your workspace all the time, and having a pet to help keep you company! After dinner, take a stroll through the neighborhood and check out everything.
Lucky for you you?re nestled on a residential block, close to shops, stores, and Transportation options are the N/Q at Broadway, and R/M at Steinway, an estimated 20 min. to Midtown? for those who commute.

Stunning 3 Bed Apt, 1.5 Bath! Laundry and Bike Room in Bld. Steps to Franklin Ave! By 2.3.4.5 Train
Apartment Features: - 4 bedrooms all fit full-size beds - Open living room / open modern kitchen with dishwasher - Modern tiled 1.5 bathrooms - Laundry and bike room in the building - Central A/C and heating
This apartment is a short block to Franklin Ave, which is loaded with artisan bars, restaurants, cafes, coffee shops, and so much more. You are also a short walk to the Brooklyn Museum, Botanical Gardens, Brooklyn Public Library, Prospect Park, and Grand Army Plaza (which features an awesome farmers market of Saturdays).

3 bed 1.5 bath available!
- 3 bedrooms - 1.5 bath - DUPLEX - hardwood floors - newly renovated - dishwasher - central AC

Sunny, newly renovated 4 bedroom!
Featuring: - Shared roof deck - Laundry in the building - Pet friendly
NO FEE!

----- Luxury 3 bedroom 2 bath, available now ------
Housed in what was formerly known as the Empire State Dairy Company, The Highland is one of Brooklyn?s most recent landmarked buildings. Steeped in rich history, The residence now spans 14 stories and offers Studio, 1, 2, and 3 bedroom homes.
Our units feature ? Modern Elegant Kitchens ? Quartz Countertops ? Stainless Steel Appliances ? Panelized Dishwashers ? In-unit washer/dryer ? Floor- to- ceiling windows ? White Oak Flooring ? Mini split heating/cooling system
Bathroom features include ? White Oak Vanities ? Floor-to-ceiling grooved ceramic wall tiles ? Deep soaking tub ? Stone style floor tiles
Our building features ? Laundry room ? Bike Storage ? Resident Lounge ? Business Center ? Kids Playroom ? Fitness Center ? Rooftop Lounge ? Two Outdoor Terraces
Located just south of Highland Park, Cypress Hills is home to passionate individuals who share a strong appreciation for their neighborhood due to its rich and vibrant history, local bars, restaurants, and cafes, and community gardens, parks, and green spaces. Boasting 101 acres, Highland Park is situated on a high plateau and offers stunning views of the Ridgewood Reservoir, Rockaways, and Atlantic Ocean. Additional parks and green spaces include Shirley Chisholm State Park, Hamilton Beach Park, Sperandeo Brothers Playground, the Herbal Garden of East New York, George Walker Jr. Park, Martin Luther King Jr. Playground, Grace Playground, Noakhali Cricket Field, and Sutter Ballfields.

Introducing a beautiful, newly renovated 3 bedroom duplex in the desirable neighborhood of Stuyvesant Heights!
This spacious and sunny duplex offers a range of modern amenities and is ideally located on the border of Bushwick and Williamsburg, right in the heart of Bed Stuy. With its contemporary design and sleek finishes, this residence is a true gem.
Key Features:
Exposed Brick Walls Stainless Steel Appliances Hardwood Floors High Ceilings Laundry in Unit Dishwasher Stone Countertops Central AC Pet-Friendly Abundant Natural Light Roof Deck Step into this duplex and be captivated by the charming exposed brick walls that add character to the space. The kitchen boasts stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher, and features sleek stone countertops that complement the modern aesthetic. Throughout the duplex, you'll find beautiful hardwood floors and high ceilings that create an open and airy atmosphere. The convenience of an in-unit laundry facility adds to the comfort and practicality of this home.
For those hot summer days or relaxing evenings, central AC ensures that you stay cool and comfortable. Pets are welcome, so you can bring your furry companions along to enjoy this wonderful space with you. Natural light floods the rooms, creating a warm and inviting ambiance.
One of the highlights of this property is the roof deck, offering a perfect spot to unwind and soak in the surrounding views.
Transportation options are plentiful, with easy access to the J, Z, G, M, and other public transportation routes.

details.description:
The open-plan living and dining area is spacious and airy, with plenty of room for entertaining and relaxation. The kitchen has modern appliances, including a gas stove, refrigerator, and dishwasher, and features plenty of counter and cabinet space.
The bedroom is generously sized, with ample space for a queen-sized bed and other furniture. The bathroom has been recently updated with new fixtures and finishes, including a modern vanity and a shower/tub combo.
The building has a live-in superintendent and offers amenities such as a laundry room and a bike storage area. It is conveniently located near several subway lines, including the 2, 3, 4, and 5 trains, providing easy access to Manhattan and other parts of Brooklyn. There are also many restaurants, bars, and shops in the area, making it a great neighborhood for those who love to explore.

details.description:
It sounds like you've found an incredible space in Gowanus! This large 3-bedroom duplex w/ basement with back deck. Let's dive into the details:
This duplex boasts two levels of spacious living:
Upstairs, you'll find three well-appointed bedrooms, each with its own closet, alongside an open kitchen/living area and a full bathroom. Downstairs, the large basement offers two additional rooms and a convenient half bath, along with the added bonus of PRIVATE BACKYARD! The apartment is equipped with central A/C and heat, a dishwasher, and WASHER/DRYER IN UNIT!
Nestled between 3rd and 4th Aves in Gowanus, the location couldn't be more convenient. Just steps from the Union Street R station, with easy access to Atlantic Ave-Barclays (2/3/4/5/B/D/N/Q/R) and Bergen; Carroll St (F/G) stations, commuting is a breeze. Plus, you'll have a wealth of shops, restaurants, and bars right at your doorstep.
This duplex offers the perfect blend of space, comfort, and convenience. Don't miss out?schedule a viewing today!

details.description: This apartment sounds like a dream! With brand new appliances and a spacious kitchen featuring a dishwasher and kitchen island, cooking and entertaining would be a breeze. The fact that each bedroom has a queen-sized bed, ensuite bathroom, standard-sized closet, and big window ensures comfort and convenience for everyone living there. Plus, having central AC and laundry in the building are huge bonuses. And with easy access to public transportation and plenty of nearby amenities like bars, cafes, and restaurants, it seems like the perfect blend of comfort and convenience!

This will move fast, seriously call/email now to take a tour!

Discover a luxurious and contemporary four-bedroom duplex with a basement and shared yard in the heart of prime Bushwick. Just steps from Maria Hernandez Park and surrounded by abundant shopping and vibrant nightlife, this residence offers convenience and style. Only 15 minutes from NYC.
The modern apartment features a dishwasher, in-building laundry, and central A/C and heating. Pet-friendly with no fees. Enjoy upscale living in a prime location.

Introducing the Winslow, Astoria?s latest gem and waterfront marvel nestled in the charming Hallets Point neighborhood of Queens
This boutique tower stands as a testament to modern luxury, offering an unparalleled living experience with breathtaking views of both the tranquil waterfront and the iconic New York City skyline. Located in close proximity to buses and the ferry, the Winslow provides convenient access to transportation, ensuring that residents can easily explore the vibrant city beyond. The Winslow sets itself apart with its thoughtfully designed units, boasting spacious layouts, expansive windows, and private balconies in most residences. Revel in the beauty of these homes, featuring meticulously crafted kitchens with high-end appliances and elegantly tiled bathrooms. Each detail has been carefully curated to create a harmonious living space that combines comfort and sophistication.
This premier waterfront tower not only offers stunning residences but also an array of exceptional amenities. Residents can take advantage of convenient parking, secure bike storage, and a dedicated package room. The Winslow goes above and beyond with additional features like a well-equipped gym, game room, and business lounge. The rooftop, adorned with picturesque views and grilling stations, provides the perfect setting for social gatherings. With balconies in most units and a majority enjoying water views, the Winslow promises a lifestyle of tranquility and luxury. As the newest addition to Astoria, a neighborhood known for its proximity to Manhattan coupled with its serene ambiance, the Winslow stands out as a haven of modern living in the heart of the city.
